FuncDef: This command configures the ingress queue group queue low drop tail as a percentage reduction from the MBS of the queue. For example, if a queue has an MBS of 600 kbytes and the percentage reduction is configured to be 30% for the low drop tail, the low drop tail will be at 420 kbytes. Out-of-profile packets will not be accepted into the queue and will be discarded if the queue depth is greater than this value.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the percentage reduction from the MBS for a queue drop tail. Values-0 to 100, default.
